mapper.update:
update EUPS.EUPS_BATCH_INFO_DETAIL
BAT_NO = #{batNo,jdbcType=CHAR},
CUS_AC = #{cusAc,jdbcType=CHAR},
CUS_NME = #{cusNme,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
TXN_AMT = #{txnAmt,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
AGT_SRV_CUS_ID = #{agtSrvCusId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
AGT_SRV_CUS_NME = #{agtSrvCusNme,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
OUR_OTH_FLG = #{ourOthFlg,jdbcType=CHAR},
OBK_BK = #{obkBk,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
RMK1 = #{rmk1,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
RMK2 = #{rmk2,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
STS = #{sts,jdbcType=CHAR},
ERR_MSG = #{errMsg,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
TXN_DTE = #{txnDte,jdbcType=DATE},
where SQN = #{sqn,jdbcType=CHAR}
mapper.select:
select
from EUPS.EUPS_BATCH_INFO_DETAIL
where SQN in
#{item}

SELECT * FROM (SELECT COALESCE(COUNT(*), 0) TOTCNT1, COALESCE(SUM(TXN_AMT), 0) TOTAMT1 FROM EUPS.EUPS_BATCH_INFO_DETAIL WHERE TXN_DTE >=#{beginDate} AND TXN_DTE <=#{endDate} AND STS='S'AND SUBSTR(CUS_AC,1,4)!='4849' AND LENGTH(RTRIM(CUS_AC)) IN (21,18) AND RMK2=#{comNo} ) A, (SELECT * FROM EUPS.EUPS_BATCH_INFO_DETAIL WHERE TXN_DTE >=#{beginDate} AND TXN_DTE <=#{endDate} AND STS='S' AND SUBSTR(CUS_AC,1,4)!='4849' AND LENGTH(RTRIM(CUS_AC)) IN (21,18) AND RMK2=#{comNo} ) B

SELECT * FROM (SELECT COALESCE(COUNT(*), 0) TOTCNT2, COALESCE(SUM(TXN_AMT), 0) TOTAMT2 FROM EUPS.EUPS_BATCH_INFO_DETAIL WHERE TXN_DTE >=#{beginDate} AND TXN_DTE <=#{endDate} AND STS='S' AND SUBSTR(CUS_AC,1,4) IN ('0750','4849') AND RMK2=#{comNo} ) A, (SELECT * FROM EUPS.EUPS_BATCH_INFO_DETAIL WHERE TXN_DTE >=#{beginDate} AND TXN_DTE <=#{endDate} AND STS='S' AND SUBSTR(CUS_AC,1,4) IN ('0750','4849') AND RMK2=#{comNo} ) B

SELECT * FROM (SELECT COALESCE(COUNT(*), 0) TOTCNT3, COALESCE(SUM(TXN_AMT), 0) TOTAMT3 FROM EUPS.EUPS_BATCH_INFO_DETAIL WHERE TXN_DTE >=#{beginDate} AND TXN_DTE <=#{endDate} AND STS='S'AND LENGTH(RTRIM(CUS_AC))!=18 AND SUBSTR(CUS_AC,1,1)='6' AND RMK2=#{comNo} ) A, (SELECT * FROM EUPS.EUPS_BATCH_INFO_DETAIL WHERE TXN_DTE >=#{beginDate} AND TXN_DTE <=#{endDate} AND STS='S' AND LENGTH(RTRIM(CUS_AC))!=18 AND SUBSTR(CUS_AC,1,1)='6' ANd RMK2=#{comNo} ) b
